title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: SUI Drops 5.9% as Index Trades Lower
summary: Avalanche (AVAX) was also among the underperformers, falling 2.4% from Thursday.
author: CoinDesk Indices
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2786.55, down 0.4% (-11.45) since 4 p.m. ET on Thursday.

Four of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: BCH (+1.8%) and BTC (+0.4%).

Laggards: SUI (-5.9%) and AVAX (-2.4%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index is trading lower with most assets declining, led by significant drops in SUI (-5.9%) and AVAX (-2.4%).
